headline: W. R. Berkley Corporation to Present at the 2024 Goldman Sachs U.S. Financial Services Conference
summary: GREENWICH, Conn., November 25, 2024--W. R. Berkley Corporation (NYSE: WRB) announced today that W. Robert Berkley, Jr., its president and chief executive officer, will present at the 2024 Goldman Sachs U.S. Financial Services Conference. The presentation will take place on Wednesday, December 11, 2024 at 11:20 a.m. eastern time.
